```{r, include = F}
require(tidyverse)
require(gridExtra)
require(egg)
require(grid)
```


# Load summarized data
```{r}
load(file = "../../results/data/summary_emerge_prop_ShrubSpp.Rdata")
```

# Plot
```{r}
plot_emerge_prop <- 
  ggplot(summary_emerge)+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_line(aes(x = Years, y = mean, linetype = Species,  col = sim_spp, group = interaction(Species, sim_spp)), size = 1.2)+
  geom_ribbon(aes(x = Years, ymin = mean-sd, ymax = mean+sd, fill = sim_spp, group = interaction(Species, sim_spp)), alpha = .2)+
  ylab("Proportion of initial trees that have emerged")+
  xlab("Years since fire")+
  
  theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.2))+
   scale_fill_manual(name = "Shrub species", 
                    values = c("#d95f02", "#1b9e77", "#e7298a"), 
                                labels = c("Manzanita", 
                                "Whitethorn", 
                                "Deerbrush"))+

  scale_color_manual(name = "Shrub species", 
                    values = c("#d95f02","#1b9e77",  "#e7298a"), 
                                labels = c("Manzanita", 
                                "Whitethorn", 
                                "Deerbrush"))+
  scale_linetype_discrete(labels = c("White fir",
                          "Ponderosa pine"))+
  
  theme(text = element_text(size = 11), 
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.spacing=unit(0, "cm"),
        legend.text=element_text(size=11),
        legend.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0)
        )+

  xlab(element_blank())+
  xlim(c(9,max(summary_emerge$Years)))

plot_emerge_prop
```

# Plot Q50 
```{r}
Q50 <- summary_emerge %>% 
  mutate(dist50 = mean-.5) %>% 
  filter(dist50>0) %>%
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(Species, sim_spp) %>% 
  filter(dist50 == min(dist50)) %>% 
  mutate(bound = "mean")

Q50_ub <- summary_emerge %>% 
  mutate(lowerdist50 = mean-sd-.5) %>% 
  filter(lowerdist50>0) %>%
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(Species, sim_spp) %>% 
  filter(lowerdist50 == min(lowerdist50)) %>% 
  mutate(bound = "upper")

Q50_lb <- summary_emerge %>% 
  mutate(upperdist50 = mean+sd-.5) %>% 
  filter(upperdist50>0) %>%
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(Species, sim_spp) %>% 
  filter(upperdist50 == min(upperdist50)) %>% 
  mutate(bound = "lower")

```

```{r}
Q50 <- full_join(Q50, Q50_lb) 
Q50 <- full_join(Q50, Q50_ub) 

Q50 <- Q50 %>% 
  dplyr::select(Years, Species, sim_spp, bound)
```

## pivot wider
```{r}
Q50 <- pivot_wider(Q50, names_from = bound, values_from = Years) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Species, sim_spp, lower, mean, upper)
```

## Replace NA with max
```{r}
Q50 <- Q50 %>% 
  mutate(upper = ifelse(is.na(upper), max(summary_emerge$Years), upper))
```

```{r}
mean_arpa_pipo <- Q50[Q50$Species == "PIPO" & Q50$sim_spp == "ARPA", "mean"] %>% unlist()
```


```{r}
Q50plot <- ggplot()+
  theme_bw()+
  geom_errorbarh(data = Q50 %>% filter(!(Species == "PIPO" & sim_spp == "ARPA")), aes(col = sim_spp, y = interaction(sim_spp, Species), xmin = lower, xmax = upper), size = 1)+
  
  geom_errorbarh(data = Q50 %>% filter((Species == "PIPO" & sim_spp == "ARPA")), aes(col = sim_spp, y = interaction(sim_spp, Species), xmin = lower, xmax = mean), size = 1, height = 0)+

  geom_linerange(data = Q50 %>% filter((Species == "PIPO" & sim_spp == "ARPA")), aes(col = sim_spp, x = lower, ymin = 1.6, ymax= 2.45), size = 1)+
  
  geom_line(aes(y = 2, x = c(mean_arpa_pipo,max(summary_emerge$Years))), size = 1, linetype = "dotted", col = "#d95f02")+
  
  geom_point(data = Q50, aes(col = sim_spp, x = mean, y = interaction(sim_spp, Species), shape = Species), size = 2, fill = "white", stroke = 1.5)+
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(16,21))+
  ylab("Shrub and tree\nspecies combination")+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#d95f02","#1b9e77",  "#e7298a"))+
  theme(axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none", 
        text = element_text(size = 11),
        panel.grid.major.y  = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.y = element_blank())+
  xlim(c(9,max(summary_emerge$Years)))+
  xlab("Years since fire")
Q50plot
```

# Save plots
```{r}
filename <- paste("../../results/figures/Simulations/shrub_species_overall_withQ50", Sys.Date(), ".jpeg", sep = "")

g <- ggarrange(plot_emerge_prop, Q50plot, heights = c(3,1), widths = 2)
ggsave(filename, g, width = 5, height = 6)
```


# Find max prop emerged for each species (for Table 1)
```{r}
summary_emerge %>% 
  group_by(Species, sim_spp) %>% 
  filter(mean == max(mean)) %>% 
  filter(Years == min(Years)) %>% 
  arrange(sim_spp)
```
